title: Buttercream sponge cake
ingredients: ['700g plain flour', '85g cornflour', '2 tablespoons baking powder', '2 teaspoons salt', '10 egg whites', '200g caster sugar', '275g margarine', '500g caster sugar', '425ml milk', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '225g butter', '950g sifted icing sugar', '4 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '125ml milk']
